# DROO.FOO

> Personal website of DROO AMOR - software engineer, blockchain researcher, and builder.
> Built with Elixir/Phoenix LiveView featuring a monospace-web aesthetic using Wickstrom's
> character-perfect grid technique, file-based content system, and generative SVG patterns.

DROO.FOO is both a portfolio and an experimental platform showcasing:
- Phoenix LiveView applications with real-time interactions
- Blockchain/Web3 projects and research
- Technical writing on Elixir, Phoenix, and distributed systems
- Open-source contributions and creative coding experiments

## Key Technologies

- **Framework**: Elixir, Phoenix 1.8, Phoenix LiveView
- **Content**: File-based markdown with MDEx parser, generative SVG patterns
- **Styling**: Monaspace Argon monospace font, 1ch character-grid CSS
- **Web3**: Ethereum integration (ENS, NFTs, tokens)
- **Infrastructure**: Fly.io hosting, Cloudflare Pages CDN
